name: chatterbox-mcp-monorepo
description: Chatterbox MCP Server with WhatsApp integration

scripts.install:all: npm install && cd mcp_server && npm install && cd ../whatsappServer && npm install
scripts.build:all: cd mcp_server && npm run build && cd ../whatsappServer && npm run build
scripts.docker:all: cd mcp_server && npm run docker:local && cd ../whatsappServer && npm run docker:local
